name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Have been wearing Dickies for 20 years now. The quality is always the same (excellent).

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Excellent brand and quality. I’ve purchased a pair directly from dickies previously that fit perfectly. The problem is as has been 3 times now that when I’ve purchased size 40 inch shorts from overseas they have sent me 36 inch. Sent back first pair as they paid for postage. I received a full refund. I’m left with the second pair of carpenter denim shorts as it would cost me almost the price I paid for the shorts in postage back to the USA. Also I have a month to drop off this pair at a parcel return which is hard as the closest is 4-5 hours drive away. Bit of a scam really if you’re not from a major city that has a return facility. Be warned if you’re looking for larger sizes. I won’t be buying off here .

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Reading the reviews, and wanting them to be baggy like my other shorts from the 90's i ordered 2 sizes up.  Im 6ft and medium build usually a 36, so i ordered a 40.I received a 36, but the fit really well, they are the exact same size/shape as an old pair of size 38 from jayjays int he 2000's. Doesnt make any sense, but i am happy with the product i received.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: These are basicly the only shorts I own, work and play. They're tough and versatile, loose fitting with spacious pockets, I thrash these shorts and pants all day everyday and they handle the abuse well, do be warned when ordering your size, they're TIGHT when zipped and clipped, either order 1 size up or just warm wash and wear them in a bit. Other than that, amazing shorts. They're tight in a 34 but i can comfortably fit 36 in these

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: My guy loves Dickies shorts, but they can be expensive.  These were great value - really good find.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: With Dickies, you play a lottery as to whether your purchase will fit. Sure, you may be a size 36, and own other dickies pants that are a size 36 that fit well, doesn't mean that your new size 36 purchase will fit. They are way too small, would be tight on a size 34 person.As it's an Amazon US purchase, if I opted to return the item and take out the return postage cost Amazon has set, I would be refunded 51cents.  Might as well try to flog them on ebay now.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: The sizing is ridiculous, I bought the size up as I understand they come small still nowhere near.A waste of time

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: perfectos, un poco gruesos para el calor

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Very comfortable.  Easy to wear when you need to be a bit smarters in shorts or just kicking about in the countryside.  Perfect.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: I’m a bigger man and buying any sort of pants or shorts online can be a game shoot. These were perfect! Perfect fit in perfect style for exactly what I want it. Always a big fan of dickies.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Me quedan como esperaba. Personalmente no quería que me quedaran como en la imagen que se muestra así que me pedí una talla más grande. Mido aproximadamente 1,80 metros y compre una 32 x Regular. Me cubren las rodillas como deseaba. Perfectos.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Live Dickies longer short style… have a few colour options now. Just a heads up - dickies can come up small… size up.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Pour l été être bien dans un short qui laisse passer l air

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Bought theses and a pair of Dickies pants. Both in size 36, the pants fit perfectly, but the shorts are a little on the small side.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 August 2023

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Hatte die Hose in "33" bestellt, geliefert wurde "32" was für mich viel zu eng war. Habe jetzt in Größe "34" nochmal bestellt.  Auf die Rücksendebestätigung warte ich jetzt leider noch.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Great shorts for workGood quality

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: problème récurent avec dickies, taille haute sur ce modèle, fait du 42 habituellement, pour le porté sur les hanches il me faudrait un 46 ...

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: I like these shorts, good quality and feel as though they'd last. Sizing though was my issue. Some other reviewers said that they do come up small, but I thought that as I have some Dickies workwear trousers in this size, I'd get the same size shorts. They were 2-3 inches smaller round the waist than the Dickies workwear trousers I have.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Love these shorts. Bought several pairs that i use for work and home during the summer. Super comfy and durable.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: en effet prévoir 1 taille au dessus. sinon la qualité est là; ne bouge pas aux premiers lavages. produit conforme à la photo.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 October 2018

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Very good

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Great shorts! Order one size up to wear it oversize

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Aber hat mir nicht gefallen und würde weggeschickt
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 July 2015

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Short de corte amplio, excelentes para el trabajo.Considera adquirir 2 tallas arriba de lo usual, porque a pesar de ser corte amplio, la talla queda justa.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 21 August 2019

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Good shorts. but had to return them as they are smaller than the other pairs i have even though it bought a size bigger than normal

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Son el modelo esperado y quedan muy bien puestos, la calidad de dickies a mi parecer es inigualable, de 10

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: tuve que devolverlo porque la talla era demasiado pequeña a pesar de haber pedido la mia, cuidado al elegir la talla que vais a usar
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 July 2018

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Super génial

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Normally buy Redhawks in a 32 which tend to be too loose so opted for 31 in these which fit well but should have probably bought a 32 so they weren't so fitted. Material feels very tuff and we're stiff on arrival so washed them on a slightly higher heat to soften slightly.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Amo questi loose short,ne ho di parecchi colori,e,come sempre,sono comodi e di ottima fattura!Solo per chi tende a vestire largo!

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Always loved Dickies

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Quality and customer svc was second to none but the shorts were a 13inch wide leg far far to wide looked like I was wearing a skirt pmsl  appart from that highly recomend

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Great

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Shorts of good quality just like regular Dickies from the store. Only difference is you can tell that these have never been unfolded. They have so much Scotchgard that they can literally stand in the corner lol. The reviews are correct which suggest getting a size a bigger because these for some reason seem to run small. I got a size bigger than what I normally wear and they fit perfectly.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 August 2018

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Me quedo más una talla más chica de lo que la pedí, pero es buena la calidad de la prenda
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 December 2018

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Die w46 fällt aus wie w44 bzw. Binahe w42.Ursprünglich in w44 bestellt, welche viel zu klein war, obwohl ich bereits dutzende Hosen in dieser Größe habe die passen oder auch rutschen.In w46 nachbestellt, in der Annahme dass die Hose am Ende Wohl zu groß ist. Falsch gedacht. Die Hose ist so groß wie eine eng geschnitte Dickies in w44. Ich habe die Hosen übereinander gelegt und sie sind gleich groß.Dickies hat in den letzten Jahren die Größentabelle angepasst. Je nachdem wann die Hose produziert, konnte man 2 Hosen bestellen die trotz gleicher Größe unterschiedlich gepasst haben. Gleiches gilt auch für Hemden. Das Macht es schwer online zu bestellen.Wie immer eine super Qualität. Aber wenn man früher schon eine Nummer größer bestellen müsste aufgrund des kleinen Schnitts, sind es jetzt eher 2 Nummern.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 10 February 2024

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: conforme à la qualité dickies mais un poil plus serré à la ceinture que leurs pantalons pour un port decontracté voir pour une taille d eplus

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Material is nice, but the waist part was so tight,i took 2 size bigger but its very tight, had a hard time buckling it up, please take 3-4 size bigger if you want it.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Feel like they are made of the worst burlap sacks of your nightmares. They fit so small and even with loads of fabric softener, they probably worked like a bullet proof vest

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Au top

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Meine zweiten Shorts von Dickies. Sie sitzen perfekt, auch wenn die Größe im Vgl. zu meinen Jeans anders ausfällt. Bei Jeans habe ich eine Bundweite von 30 und bei den Shorts brauche ich 32.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: good product

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Todo bien con el producto, Dickies, original, calidad, etc. El problema es que las tallas vienen reducidas. Yo uso pantalones Dickies y me queda bien la talla 32, pero esta me quedó como 28. Así que pidan 1 o 2 más grands

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Im 165cm in height.Weighing 65KG to 69KGUsually wear a waist size 30-31 for Jeans etc.After reading much reviews regarding this shorts, i took size 33. Overall its fits nice with a belt on.I suggest you took 2 size up.Example if you wore 34, take 36 or 37.Because if you take the size you are wering right now, tha chances are you CAN'T fit.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: super matos bonne coupe large US je recommande pour un good look multi poche voir prix selon vendeur grande différence a vous de voir !

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Perfect fit and fast delivery!

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Ich hab mir die Hose in meiner Standartgröße 32 bestellt und nicht mal ansatzweise zu bekommen. Ca. 3cm fehlten, dass sie überhaupt zu geht. Sie fällt mindestens zwei Größen kleiner aus und als ich sie mir nochmals in 34 bestellt habe stand dort auf dem Etikett zwar 34, aber von der Größe das exakt selbe Ergebnis wie bei der letzten und zwar dass 3cm fehlten, um sie überhaupt zu zu bekommen... Sehr enttäuschendes Ergebnis. Hab da definitiv mehr erwartet als so eine schwache qualitative Leistung.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Superb same as the biege ones I bought. Spot on
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 October 2016

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Perfect work shorts especially if you're in the garage or kitchen

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: the shorts are good, not bad quality or anything. The waist fitted perfectly. also the shorts were 31 cuz i’m a “cholo”. that’s what my dad calls me lol.
